TypeDefinition

createhashmapobject [XPS_typ_Exception, [_source*, _target*, _message*, _data*]]
Authors

Crashdome

Description

HashmapObject which stores data about an error condition.  Typically is thrown using the throw command and possibly handled using try / catch

Optionals
_source

(optional - Default: nil) - Anything

_target

(optional - Default: nil) - Anything

_message

(optional - Default: nil) - String - custom message to override the default

_data

(optional - Default: nil) - Hashmap - hashmap of data that provides more detail to cause of exception

Returns

HashmapObject

Reserved
#create
call [#create, [_source*, _target*, _message*, _data*]]
Optionals
_source

(optional - Default: nil) - Anything

_target

(optional - Default: nil) - Anything

_message

(optional - Default: nil) - String - custom message to override the default

_data

(optional - Default: nil) - Hashmap - hashmap of data that provides more detail to cause of exception

Returns

True

         Target: (target)
         Message: (message)
         Data: (data)
